attributes.action: Listen to Lord Avebury and stop the pointless Dale Farm eviction and abuse
attributes.additional_details:
Moving these people on after all this time is counterproductive and unnecessarily cruel.

It is an abuse of taxpayers money at a time when it cannot be afforded.

Do not stand by and watch this new form of state approved racism blossom at our expense.

Sign up now, before it's too late.
